title: Ep 299 | Phil Robertson Rushes Miss Kay to the Hospital in the Middle of the Night
description:
Phil is stunned to find Miss Kay bleeding profusely when she wakes him up after a goodnight kiss for their dog goes awry. An ER worker chews Phil out for not wearing a mask, and he is NOT having it. Miss Kay just wants everyone to know the accident wasn't Bobo's fault, and Jase decides they need a protocol for waking up pets. In other news, Al's GPS does him wrong. Mia decides to get rebaptized by Phil. And the guys discuss baptism finger-wagging, groups that elevate the church above Jesus, and why it's important to be open about your testimony.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
